References.name: Melody Shi
References.title: CodingPlusOne CEO
References.text: "Overall, I cannot recommend Christopher highly enough. I am confident that he would be a valuable asset to any organization and would excel in any role related to research and coding instruction."

References.name: Krzysztof J Batory
References.title: Mars Analytical Microimager
References.text: "But beyond his inborn technical prowess, Christopher's personable demeanor in a team environment and his conflict resolution abilities are far beyond his youth, being more synonymous with qualities of a mature CEO."

References.name: Roozbeh Safaveih
References.title: Plasmagear CEO
References.text: "Chris Pederson's outstanding performance as an intern is a testament to his unique combination of critical thinking, technological agility, and discipline-specific skills. His critical thinking ability is not just academic; it's practical, allowing him to innovate and solve real-world problems."
